author: A_Brickset_user
title: Very Cool!
review: This set, along with Jango Fett, is very detailed and kind of look like the image they are trying to make! This stormtrooper carries a "rifle" that shoots the awesome little darts. The stormtrooper is cool, it is low cost and well worth the technic effort! get it if ya' like stormies!

author: VideoGameLord613
title: The one and only 5
review:
This set is great! I agree with the other guy that posted the review! 
Pros:
Looks really like a Stormtrooper!
Has a missle to launch!
Good for teaching your enemies a lesson

Cons:
Sometimes missle doesn't want to go in the gun after shot
Missle could have unexpectedly shot

author: hustla187
title: Looks Like One
review: This is a model of a stormtrooper released in 2001. The gun looks very cool and also very detailed. I could imagine a possible army with these sets. It is very good and better than 3PO. 5 out of 5 for a great job on this set.
